RULES 
 Snap! Is the classic card game where each player gets 26 card 
 one card at a time till the time the pair matches for example two 
 'Aces' two 2's. As soon as two cards match both players has the opportinity 
 to click on their respective side to snap the cards and whoever is successful in 
 tapping first gets the cards on the deck. 
 The game continues until one player finishes all of their cards and may also end 
 in draw if both players finish their cards.
